typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Age as integer,
		Attrition as boolean,
		BusinessTravel as string,
		DailyRate as short,
		Department as string,
		DistanceFromHome as short,
		Education as short,
		EducationField as string,
		EmployeeCount as boolean,
		EmployeeNumber as short,
		EnvironmentSatisfaction as short,
		Gender as string,
		HourlyRate as short,
		JobInvolvement as short,
		JobLevel as short,
		JobRole as string,
		JobSatisfaction as short,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		MonthlyIncome as short,
		MonthlyRate as short,
		NumCompaniesWorked as short,
		Over18 as boolean,
		OverTime as boolean,
		PercentSalaryHike as short,
		PerformanceRating as short,
		RelationshipSatisfaction as short,
		StandardHours as short,
		StockOptionLevel as short,
		TotalWorkingYears as short,
		TrainingTimesLastYear as short,
		WorkLifeBalance as short,
		YearsAtCompany as short,
		YearsInCurrentRole as short,
		YearsSinceLastPromotion as short,
		YearsWithCurrManager as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> hrdata
